name: Lego MicroGame Platformer
description:
Title: Adventures of Lego Man

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual games

Game Overview:

A platformer made using Unity in the LEGO style

Run and jump across this daring platformer as you strive to reach the end.

Game Design Team: James Oakes – Game Designer
